abstract: Both the European Central Bank and the Bank of England kept their key interest rates unchanged Thursday amid concerns of high inflation and a slowing economy.
snippet: Both the European Central Bank and the Bank of England kept their key interest rates unchanged Thursday amid concerns of high inflation and a slowing economy.
lead_paragraph: FRANKFURT  Two key European central banks left their benchmark interest rates unchanged on Thursday as they decided to wait to assess whether sharply slower growth would help to curb inflation.

headline.main: Two Banks in Europe Stand Pat on Rates
headline.print_headline: Two Banks In Europe Stand Pat On Rates
